rComments: Greatest teacher you will ever get to know!! As long as you do all the work and show up to class you are parented to passe. Maybe not with an A but still a fun and enjoyable class to go to. I ever wanted this class to end. Trust me and take it.

This was my favorite class this quarter.  Because of him, I passed the AWPE the second time around.  He gives great feedback on your essays and responds back fairly quickly to any questions you may have in class.  I wish his writing 2 class wasn't full next quarter because I would have definitely taken it.

Professor Coulter is a chill teacher. He truly tries to make the class enjoyable for his students and is always looking for new ways to get them interested. I took WRIT 2 Sustainable Future and I received an A. Just go to his office hours occasionally and get your essay critiqued by him. He's a good guy and often brings snacks as motivation!

Coulter's core class wasn't too bad. He makes you attend workshops for your writing and Sword Reviews. He likes peer editing. Class discussions were not too interesting, but overall, not a bad class. Allowed 2 absences throughout the quarter. nice guy!
